        Constructor
        Parameters:
        left_arrow - GPU id of left arrow texture
        right_arrow - GPU id of right arrow texture
        slider_background - GPU id of slider background texture
        slider - GPU id of slider texture
        slider_location - Slider location
        scale - Scale of slider
        location - Initial location of slider
